name: A Town Full of Monsters
description:
Title: A Town Full of Monsters

Platform: Computer/HTML

Genre: Interactive

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You're moving into a new town but there's one problem, monsters supposedly live there too! Point and click your way through a tale in meeting these so-called monsters.

Instructions: Click the link and play!

Created by: Erielle Seigel

Preview image by: Concrete Road Surrounded by Trees · Free Stock Photo (pexels.com)
